headline: Should Investors Reassess International Flavors & Fragrances After 40% Stock Slide in 2024?
summary: If you’ve been watching International Flavors & Fragrances and wondering whether its recent plunge means opportunity or added risk, you’re far from alone. After closing at $60.10, the stock has been through the wringer. We’re talking drops of -2.3% in the past week, -8.4% over the last month, and a hefty -27.7% so far this year. Stretch further, and things look even harsher, with a -41.6% loss in the past twelve months and a -39.4% return over five years. That’s a bruising stretch for any...
